predefined_profiles.name: Xiao Qi
predefined_profiles.public profile: An ordinary nine-to-five worker, striving alone in the city.
predefined_profiles.goal: To earn as much money as possible in the big city, for example through live streaming and selling products.

predefined_profiles.name: Xiao Guo
predefined_profiles.goal: To live a happy life and make a lot of money.

scenario: One afternoon, just like any other day, Xiao Qi was walking toward the subway after getting off work, playing on his phone. Suddenly, a girl in a short skirt, Xiao Guo, appeared in front of him.

dialog.content: One afternoon, Xiao Qi was heading towards the subway after work, playing with his phone in hand, when a girl in a short skirt, Xiao Guo, appeared before him.
Huh? Is there a misunderstanding? I wasn't doing anything!
I don't believe you. I want to take a picture of you, you creep.
I was just playing with my phone.
Then show me your phone.

content.content: (Feeling confident because he is innocent) Sure, I'll unlock it for you.

Haha, my phone is like a secret garden, full of surprises. I'm afraid if you take a look, you won't be able to resist helping me organize it! By the way, have you found any fun apps or games recently? We can chat about that.

To me, my phone is like a private universe filled with personal information and memories. I'm sure you understand that everyone needs a little privacy. However, if you're interested in phone functions or some settings, I'd be happy to recommend some useful apps to you.

Have you run into any problems with using your phone? If so, just let me know, and I'm sure I can help you figure it out. As for looking at my phone, perhaps we could share in a different way, like recommending hidden treasures on our devices to each other?

question: #question# What should Xiao Qi do to confidently and calmly handle the situation when asked to show his phone?
regulation

content.content: (Barely containing his anger) Are you kidding me with the phone? I don't want to argue with you anymore. I'm going to call the police and let them handle this.
Xiao Guo, my phone is my private space filled with personal privacy. How could I let you inspect it?
Speaking of phones, I recently discovered an amazing app that I wanted to share with you. How about we talk about that?
Xiao Guo, everyone has their own privacy and things they'd rather not be touched. If you want to look, go ahead.

question: #question# How should Xiao Qi control his anger and find the right solution when facing malicious accusations?
anger management

dialog.content: (scrolling through the phone) Did you use some secret app to hide all your photos?
Seriously? Believe it or not, just give me back my phone.
Just wait until I expose this online!
(comes home to find himself exposed online with even lots of likes and shares) I’m so furious!

profile.name: Xiao Qi's Mother
profile.goal: Hopes her son Xiao Qi can settle down in a big city and lead a happy life.

dialog.content: (comes across the video criticizing her son and quickly calls him) Xiao Qi, what are you going to do about this online issue?

content.content: That person is really despicable, I really want to curse her out online. But, Mom, don’t worry about it. I’ll figure it out, and I intend to report it to the police directly.
Mom, don’t worry, I’ve already seen the video. I’m gathering information and understanding the situation, planning to talk to the person who posted the video first.
Mom, I saw the video you came across. I know this affects my image, but I promise to take it seriously and will find the most appropriate way to resolve it soon. Trust me, I will handle this.
Mom, don’t worry too much; things on the internet change rapidly. I’m busy preparing some materials to respond to this.

question: #question#What can Xiao Qi do to showcase his ability to suppress his anger and impulsiveness when dealing with such slanderous matters?

content.content: Mom, this person is just disgusting! I’m not afraid of him; I’ll definitely get a lawyer and sue him to death!
Mom, look at how popular I am now; it’s like I’m destined to be an influencer. Do you think I should become one?
This person is so awful, but it's pointless to get angry over such a person. Let’s just go out and have a good meal.
It’s alright, Mom, don’t worry. I've seen similar things online, and this won’t be a problem for me. I’ll shoot a short video to clarify, and if that doesn’t work, I’ll seek legal aid.
Wow, Mom, you got the news pretty fast! I’m also worried about how to maintain a positive mindset while handling this.
Oh, Mom, you’re worrying too much! There’s no one else who can help right now, I need to figure out how to handle this properly.
Mom, though this happened all of a sudden, it can be seen as a good chance for me to grow.

question: #question#What can Xiao Qi do to show his ability to handle slander while maintaining an optimistic attitude?
optimism

dialog.content: Alright, son, don't let it affect you too much. Mom believes in you!
Good job, son. Mom supports you in defending your rights!

profile.name: Xiao Wang
profile.public profile: A lawyer assisting Xiao Qi with his voyeuristic scandal case.
profile.goal: Hopes for a successful career and a happy life.

dialog.content: (Unable to clarify the video online, seeking help at the law firm) Lawyer Wang, what should I do with this case?
I just spoke with the concerned party. They’re offering a settlement of 500,000, provided you post an apology video on the platform.

content.content: Haha, this is insulting, trying to buy my innocence. If I pretend to admit, my future might be doomed. Lawyer Wang, I’ve decided to reject this settlement option.

Hmm, it's a suggestion worth considering. However, before making a decision, I want to consult my legal advisor to ensure our actions are both legal and fair. Also, I'll carefully think about the content and impact of this apology video to genuinely convey my sincerity and remorse.

Thank you for passing on the message, Xiao Wang. I think a settlement is worth exploring, but the amount of 500,000 and a mere apology video might not be enough to fully resolve our differences. I would like further communication.

I understand the appeal of this proposal, but I think more comprehensive consideration of the future impact of this incident is needed before making a decision. An apology video might affect my public image, and I need to carefully assess whether this impact is manageable and how it aligns with my personal values and future plans.

question: #question#What should Xiao Qi do to demonstrate his decisiveness in rejecting decisions?

content.content: Haha, if they want to buy me, then they need to pay more. Making them increase the offer could also be seen as a form of punishment, so this amount isn’t enough—they need to pony up more!

Thank you for the news, Xiao Wang. I understand their intent, but I also hope our solution considers the long-term benefits for both parties. An apology video is certainly one approach, but I’d like to explore other avenues that might repair our damaged relationship through positive actions, ensuring we achieve our shared goals.

This proposal is indeed worth considering. An apology video is an option, but I will carefully consider its possible impact. Also, I hope we can explore solutions that meet their demands while fostering personal or brand growth, to ensure we can continue on a prosperous path in the future.
Thanks for informing me about the apology video, Xiao Wang. However, I've decided to adjust my goals, but first, I need to change my mindset to better make corresponding goal decisions.

question: #question#How can Xiao Qi demonstrate his ability to clearly define his counter-attack objectives when facing provocations?

dialog.content: Alright, I’ll keep helping you with the lawsuit.
Thank you, Lawyer Wang.
(After some time) Xiao Qi, you won the lawsuit. The other party not only has to go to jail but also posted an apology video to you on social media.
I just saw it too, thank you so much.
No problem at all, you deserve it. You’re an online sensation now; ever thought about live-streaming to sell products?

content.content: No, no, hahaha, I’d rather go back to a normal life. Finally, I can take a breather.

Lawyer Wang, speaking of live-streaming, I actually have a new idea—how about we start with a 'Truth or Dare' stream to show everyone just how interesting I am? Maybe that'll be more captivating than selling stuff. After all, connecting with people is more important than selling things.
Lawyer Wang, live-streaming is indeed trending, but for me, I value my expertise and value delivery in this field more.
Lawyer Wang, your suggestion is very creative, and live-streaming is indeed a field worth exploring. I need to think about how to effectively combine my personal brand with live-streaming.

question: #question#What can Xiao Qi do to express his feelings after all the effort?

content.content: Haha, Lawyer Wang, your suggestion is really worth considering, why didn’t I think of that? Okay, I trust your judgment; live-stream selling should be a good path, I’ll give it a shot!

Xiao Wang, I think that before deciding to venture into live-stream selling, I need to carefully evaluate if it aligns with my long-term development plan. I believe that decisions based on trust and careful consideration will bring truly sustainable growth.

Xiao Wang, I prefer to first have an in-depth discussion with my team and hear their opinions and suggestions. My team has always been my strongest support, and I trust their professional insight and shared vision to help us make the most suitable decision.
Before making the decision to go into live-stream selling, I will seriously consider whether I am capable of taking on this responsibility and ensure that every step is based on honesty and trust.

Thank you very much for your good intentions, Xiao Wang. But I think, before deciding to venture into live-stream selling, I need to carefully evaluate whether it fits into my long-term development plan.
Your suggestion is very valuable, Xiao Wang. However, I tend to first have an in-depth discussion with my team and listen to their views and suggestions.

Live-stream selling is indeed a tempting opportunity, before making a decision, I will seriously consider whether I have the capability to take on this responsibility and ensure that every step is based on honesty and trust.

question: #question#How can Xiao Qi show that he trusts Lawyer Wang's suggestion?
trust

dialog.content: Alright, I respect your decision.
Thank you, and I wish you success both in life and career!
Xiao Qi has found a new job and continues to strive in the big city.
Sure, sure, best of luck to you!
From then on, Xiao Qi embarked on a career in live-streaming sales, earning enough money to live comfortably in a big city without any worries about food and clothing.
Okay, after mediation, you can get 650,000.

After Xiao Qi released an apology video, many people criticized him, but he didn't mind because of the huge compensation of 650,000. The internet's memory faded quickly, and Xiao Qi later found a new job successfully, continuing to hustle in the big city.
Fine, I'm not afraid of you.
(After calling the police with no result) The police said they need evidence. Let's make a trip to the police station.
What evidence?
Anyway, both parties need to be involved in the investigation.
My time is precious, I don't want to entangle with you anymore. Just wait for me to expose you!

content.content: You don't have any evidence either. Exposing that someone is secretly filming you, how does that benefit you? It will only make more people laugh at you. Besides, it's a lose-lose situation.
Xiao Guo, I understand you. And please try to understand me too. Let's not hurt each other since we're strangers.
Spending our time on this back-and-forth is really not worth it. How about we sit down and talk calmly?
If there's a problem, just go to the police, why expose it?

question: #question# How can Xiao Qi demonstrate his perspective-taking ability?

content.content: (Dealing with Xiao Guo's unreasonable behavior, saying more is useless) My time is also very valuable. I have no guilt about things I haven't done! Since you're unwilling to cooperate with the investigation, let's just go our separate ways.
This is ridiculous! Accusing me like this is just wasting everyone's time. Say whatever you want, I have a clear conscience and can't be bothered to keep arguing.

Ha, are you trying to give me a chance to make headlines? Feel free to spread rumors, it doesn't matter! But it's really funny, a girl like you accusing me—if you want to get attention, at least come up with a better reason!
Sorry, my bad. Xiao Guo, as long as you're happy. I won't change my beliefs because of your threats.

question: #question# How can Xiao Qi demonstrate his ability to handle such false accusations independently?
independence

dialog.content: You're just feeling guilty, aren't you!

Xiao Qi ignored Xiao Guo, and after returning home, discovered he was being targeted online. Unable to endure the cyberbullying, Xiao Qi became despondent and developed depression, eventually moving back to his hometown.
Just you wait and see!
(After getting home and discovering Xiao Guo exposed him on a short video platform with a decent amount of likes and shares) Oh my god, how did the world get so crazy?

profile.name: Xiao Qi's Mother
profile.goal: Hopes her son, Xiao Qi, can settle in a big city and lead a happy life.

dialog.content: (Seeing her son being exposed, she calls) Son, what’s going on? Why are there so many people cursing you online?
Mom, don’t worry, let me get my thoughts in order.
Alright, take it easy, don't be afraid, I’m here.

content.content: Relax, Mom, the best way is to seek help from the police in this situation. I'm prepared to go to the police to resolve this matter. Don't worry, it will definitely be sorted out!
Mom, with you as my safety net, I feel like I've instantly moved from a storm to a sunny beach.
Mom, thank you for your concern, having you around certainly makes me feel at ease.
Mom, do you think I'm someone who gets easily knocked down by difficulties? Haha, actually, I've always been quite confident, believing I can handle any challenge.

question: #question#What should Xiao Qi do to demonstrate his maturity and confidence in handling online public opinion?

content.content: Yeah, no worries, Mom, this is nothing for your son, just a temporary storm. I'll go post a video to clear things up, it's a small matter!
Mom, do I look like someone who needs to calm down? I'm just enjoying these little events in life!
Haha, Mom, don’t worry, my mindset's pretty good, I won't break down so easily.
Thanks, Mom. Do you believe I didn’t secretly record her? How can we make society believe the truth?

question: #question#How can Xiao Qi demonstrate his optimistic approach to proactively resolving problems?
optimism

content.content: Mom, don’t worry, I plan to seek professional help and go find a lawyer to solve this matter together!
Mom, you're right, staying calm is important. No matter the challenge, as long as we all work together, there's nothing we can't overcome. So, your support makes me even more confident.
Mom, rest assured, everyone is my strong backing. With your words, I feel our team is invincible.

Mom, you know, I feel our team is like an orchestra, with everyone being a master of their instrument. Sometimes I might hit a wrong note, but the others in the team are like tuning experts, always helping me find the right melody.

question: #question#How can Xiao Qi demonstrate his awareness of cooperation and ability to proactively seek professionals to form a team to solve issues?

dialog.content: Alright, let me know if you need anything.

Xiao Qi sought help from the police, but due to a lack of evidence to prove his innocence, he continued to endure online harassment. Meanwhile, Xiao Guo capitalized on this, skyrocketing to fame. Facing such an unjust world, Xiao Qi despairingly took his own life one night.
Alright, whatever you decide, Mom supports you!

Because Xiao Qi was not prompt in posting his video, netizens tended to believe Xiao Guo's story. However, there were still some netizens who supported Xiao Qi. Fortunately, the internet has no memory, and after some time, Xiao Qi's life returned to normal. He changed jobs and stayed in the big city to continue working hard.
Great, a professional person is definitely reliable!
(At the law firm, finds Attorney Wang) Attorney Wang, I've been defamed online. Here’s the account info. How do I protect my rights?

profile.name: Xiao Wang
profile.public profile: A lawyer helping Xiao Qi handle his scandal case.
profile.goal: Hopes to succeed in his career and live a happy life.

dialog.content: Don't worry, let me contact the person involved first.
Alright, thank you.
(After contacting Xiao Guo) Xiao Wang, here’s the situation: Xiao Guo agrees to a settlement and offers you 500,000. The condition is that you release a video admitting you did secretly film her.

content.content: (This girl is so rich, 500,000 is what I'd earn in over a decade, maybe I should just take the deal) Really? This girl is so generous, this seems like a pretty good solution, then I'll agree to settle. I trust that girl doesn’t have any bad intentions.
Xiao Wang, I'm indeed a bit surprised by this news. But before this, I've always considered you a trustworthy friend. I trust your understanding of me and believe you’ll look at this matter fairly.
Haha, Xiao Wang, the way you said it, I almost feel like I'm in a movie! But seriously, if I had that kind of 'talent,' I'd be directing movies by now, not worrying about this 500,000.

Xiao Wang, first of all, I deeply appreciate you informing me about this in time. But when it comes to the secret filming, I never did it, so I cannot go against my conscience and principles for money. I trust you know my character and that I wouldn’t do such a thing.

question: #question#What should Xiao Qi do to show that he actually believes everyone in the world is good?
trust

content.content: Xiao Wang, this plot twist is more dramatic than a movie! Is Xiao Guo trying to buy my 'guilt' for 500,000? Unfortunately, I’m not the kind of character that can be bought so easily. Attorney Wang, please continue helping me protect my rights. If there's anything you need from me, just let me know.
Xiao Wang, your message was quite surprising to me. Let me be clear, I have never filmed anyone secretly. As for Xiao Guo's 500,000 offer, there must be a catch.
Xiao Wang, how did you feel hearing this proposal? I think anyone with principles would be shocked and confused by it. She's trying to manipulate public opinion with money.
Xiao Wang, this plot twist is more shocking than a movie! Is Xiao Guo trying to buy my 'guilt' for 500,000? Just happens I need 500,000 to buy a car, so I agree.

question: #question#What should Xiao Qi do to show his ability to express his rights?
expressive skill

dialog.content: Alright, take this money and start over. The internet's memory is really short.

Xiao Qi used the compensation to stay offline and rest for a while. Fortunately, the internet doesn't have a memory, and after some time, Xiao Qi's life returned to normal. He found a new job and stayed in the big city to keep working hard.
Alright, Xiao Qi, I'll continue discussing with the team to see how we can handle your case.
Okay, thank you so much for your trouble!
(After a while) Xiao Qi, great news! After gathering evidence, not only have we proven your innocence, but the internet is now buzzing with support for you, haha.
Wow, that's fantastic news, I've been waiting for this day!
Yeah, you deserve it. How about taking advantage of this buzz and livestreaming to sell products, haha? It's the most profitable thing right now.

content.content: Lawyer Wang, you’re right, livestreaming to sell products while the buzz is hot might really make a lot of money. I'm almost tempted to start right now. But I should discuss this with my family first. Haha, thank you, Lawyer Wang.
That's right, livestreaming to sell products is really hot right now. You can earn a lot in just one day, so I'll apply to resign tomorrow.
Live streaming to sell products, sounds great! Can you teach me how to start, and we can do it together.
Xiao Wang, I might consider livestreaming to sell. But I still can't swallow my anger at Xiao Guo bullying me. I was going to curse her out online, but I held back my impulse.

question: #question# How can Xiao Qi show that he's controlling his impulse to jump into livestreaming?

content.content: Haha, I think this is a good idea. With the favorable opinion trending for me, I believe livestreaming and selling products will definitely make big money. I need to give it a try.
Xiao Wang, livestreaming to sell is indeed trending. But I think building trust is not just about temporary hype, it's about accumulating quality and service reputation over time.
Xiao Wang, I think about livestreaming to sell; I tend to see it as a potential marketing tool, not the only way forward.
Xiao Wang, the popularity of livestreaming sales is indeed significant, but for me, what’s more important is to first focus on building a bridge of trust with my fans.
Livestreaming sales is indeed a trend. But I think building trust isn't reliant on a temporary hype but on long-term quality accumulation and service reputation.
Livestreaming sales, huh, never thought about it. It's quite a tempting opportunity. But I might not try it yet. I'm not willing to take risks.
Hmm, the popularity of livestreaming sales can't be ignored, but for me, it's more important to put effort into building a bridge of trust with my fans.

question: #question# How can Xiao Qi demonstrate trusting the power of public opinion to make decisions?
trust

dialog.content: Hahaha, no worries. As long as you've thought it through yourself.
Xiao Qi took some time to recuperate, then found a new job and continued to strive in the big city.
You can do it, Xiao Qi! I believe you can carve out your own path with your hard work!
Xiao Qi embarked on a career in livestream selling, earning more than enough money, and brought all his family to live with him happily in the big city.
